summary.Title: Demolitioner - Special worker - General worker for Construction Project CPH Airport
summary.JobHeadline: Demolitioner - Special worker - General worker for Construction Project CPH Airport
summary.Presentation:
On behalf of our partner, we are looking for candidates to work for a long term project for 1,5 year, minimum.
We offer contracts for different roles in the field of construction at CPH airp

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Demolitioner - Special worker - General worker for Construction Project CPH Airport
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
On behalf of our partner, we are looking for candidates to work for a long term project for 1,5 year, minimum.

We offer contracts for different roles in the field of construction at CPH airport.

Depending on the task you wish to furfill it will determine your daily work tasks presented.

The team we are looking for consist of the following type of candidate profile:

  • General worker
  • Carrying materials, sort them into different piles of sorting.
  • Demolition
  • Helper on the site.

Job Tasks are as follows:

  • Fireproofing indoor buildings, with sillicone, putz-guns.
  • Prepare the area for work, and cleanu pof the area after work is finished
  • High level quality work is needed for this.
  • No renovation work - all is brand new.

What we expect:

  • English
  • Willing to adapt to changes in the daily job tasks, if the need arises from our client
  • It is a plus if you have lived in Denmark for more than the past 5 year ( To pass the security background check to be allowed to work in Denmark ) - if you have not you need to provide a criminal record from your home country, and also provide documentation of all jobs you have worked on, in the past five years.

The salary is favorable according to the collective agreement.

(All social benefits, and transport money included)

Startup is as soon as possible.

Work hours are during the day hours (Startup between 06.00/08:00)  (Overtime can happen, if you are interested in working extra)

MEGA FLEX A/S will handle all the practical paperwork and guarantee employment under good terms, as well as handle pension and holiday pay. In other words, all you need to focus on is delivering quality work at our partner.

Application:

Interested? If so, hit the “Ansøg/Apply” Button today, and create a profile in our system ASAP. We are having candidate interviews fluidly until the startup date. If you have any questions, feel free to send a mail to a.holm@megaflex.dk and attach your phone number and we will contact you immediately.
